column4: can someone please tell me how to remove the nvidia driver from the command line. it broke my gui and i have no other computer to look it up on google
through the icon on the taskbar
told me to reboot i rebooted and now i have no visible screen on tty7
just type sudp dpkg-reconfigure xorg.conf , after that you may want to check your xorg.conf file and if it still doesnt work, try "vesa" as a drive instead of nv
